publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2257 Alex Neil: Local Authority Public Appointments—That the Parliament calls on local authorities in Scotland to apply the principles of the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 for nominations to bodies for which they have responsibility.

S2M-2257 Alex Neil: Local Authority Public Appointments—That the Parliament calls on local authorities in Scotland to apply the principles of the Public Appointments and Public Bodies etc. (Scotland) Act 2003 for nominations to bodies for which they have responsibility.
